poem.body: This is a poem to test if a client can send an xml poem to a server and get a response from the server.
O, the Pelican. So smoothly doth he crest. A wind god!
H E L L O T H E R E

Tiny little secrets Get buried in the dirt, And if they were dug up, Someone would probably get hurt, So leave them safely there, To rot amongst the leaves, Admiring instead, The truth in summer's green trees.
